steps.title: Guys are more likely to respond to lighthearted texts.
steps.subtitle: When you complain or talk about topics that bring the mood down, he might reply less. Talk about the things he likes to do, make him laugh, and use emojis to make your texts sound more fun so he keeps chatting.
sub-points: If you need to have a serious conversation, do it in person instead.
